name: Anachronism Magazine
description:
The ANACHRONIZ magazine was created during the Art Jam 2021, with the theme "Anachronism".

Alongside the magazine images, attached are some character sprite sheet for the Grandmaster "Abe" FREE that you can use in your games.

Hope you enjoyed it, see more of my work:

Instagram: @cleowillo

Interested in learning how to make a video game with no coding, and on your own time? Book a 1 on 1 session to learn from an experienced developer$17.55USD for 1 session :
